thread.title: Jesy Nelson's boyfriend Chris Clark shows her exactly what she's missing as he strips NAKED and flashes his bum on TOWIE
thread.title_full: Jesy Nelson's boyfriend Chris Clark shows her exactly what she's missing as he strips NAKED and flashes his bum on TOWIE

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Jesy Nelson's boyfriend Chris Clark shows her exactly what she's missing as he strips NAKED and flashes his bum on TOWIE
text:
Jesy Nelson's boyfriend Chris Clark shows her exactly what she's missing as he strips NAKED and flashes his bum on TOWIE TOWIE star has left Jesy to continue her US tour with Little Mix   
Jesy Nelson was sad to bid her boyfriend Chris Clark goodbye after her flew out to visit her on tour with Little Mix in America. 
And now the TOWIE star has shown his popstar girlfriend exactly what she's my missing by stripping completely naked on Wednesday night's episode of The Only Way Is Essex. 
Chris went to play football at his local sport centre with the show's newcomer Myles Barnett. 
And after a kickaround the boys hit the showers – flashing their chiselled torso and pert bums. Chris Clark got his kit off on TOWIE last night (Photo: ITVBe) The boys stripped in the changing room (Photo: ITVBe) 
And the "cheeky" scene sent fans on Twitter into a meltdown, 
"Oh hello bums," one fan commented. 
"No heating needed in my flat right now," another viewer addd. 
"Week/year made. In the shower, that bum though!" a third fan wrote. Chris flashes his bum in the changing room (Photo: ITVBe) Chris bonded with the show's newcomer Myles Barnett (Photo: ITVBe) 
It looked like Chris was having the BEST time with his new girlfriend Jesy after he joined Little Mix on tour in America earlier this week. 
But sadly after a romantic few days together, Chris had to return to the UK, leaving Jesy to complete her US tour without him. 
Sharing a selfie on Instagram, Chris admitted: "All good things must come to an end." 
Jesy looked fresh-faced and happy in the candid selfie with Chris grinning over her shoulder. Jesy Nelson and Chris Clark look pretty loved up (Photo: chrisjclark_/Instagram) 
And they fully intend to be reunited again as he added: "See you soon babe." 
The new couple only recently confirmed their relationship on Instagram. 
And the TOWIE star isn't ready to open up about his Little Mix girlfriend on the ITVBe show quite yet. 
On Sunday's episode of TOWIE, Chris went out for afternoon tea on a double-decker bus with Chloe Meadows and new couple Courtney Green and Myles Barnett. 
Myles asked his pal if their tea counted as a double date. 
And Chris revealed he once asked Chloe out on a date but "she pied me". Courtney said their afternoon tea needed a Little Mix (Photo: ITVbe) Chris didn't seem too impressed with the comment (Photo: ITVbe) He refused to talk about Jesy (Photo: ITVbe) 
It was then Courtney who threw a spanner in the works, when she added: "I feel like we need to give this a Little Mix." 
They all laughed, and Chris awkwardly replied: "I was waiting for something like that." 
It comes after Chris flew to America to support the Little Mix singer on her current tour and Jesy - who split from fiancé Jake Roche last year - took to Instagram to share a picture of them enjoying a passionate smooch. 
She captioned the sweet image "9 hours later" and added a heart emoji. Jesy Nelson and Chris (Photo: Instagram) 
Little Mix are currently touring the US with Ariana Grande, and proud boyfriend Chris has been sharing a number of pictures and videos of her gigs on his Instagram page. 
He also posted a loved-up shot of them posing backstage at the BRIT Awards last month and eagle-eyed Little Mix fans noticed Jesy is following Chris' mum on Instagram. 
A source told The Sun Online: "The TOWIE cast are currently enjoying a short break from filming and Chris is making the most of his time off by flying out to spend time with Jesy." Like us on Facebook
